review:
Dr S Ranganath has been my physician since 1988. He practised in a time when ten medicines and umpteen tests were the norm and yet he chose to be different. For one, the crowd in his clinic didn't prompt him to do a cursory job. His thoroughness and experience came through everytime. He would prescribe just one or two medicines and in the 33 years I have had just 3 or 4 tests prescribed.
Yes you have to wait but you would enjoy the details if you were the patient ,right?
And all the specialist he connected me to are still my  doctors- ortho, eye,dermatology,  *** ******* ** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** **** *******  Lot of experience.  Very nice attitude easily approachable. Very practical and good
